extensionDescription.message: This extension for Thunderbird® 68 offers the function to create Jira® issues from emails or add emails as a comment. It requires Growl® [http://www.growl.info/] for Mac OS® X users to work. If not installed, falls back to the alert window. Contains icons from Aha-Soft®: [http://www.small-icons.com/packs/24x24-free-application-icons.htm], Mozilla® Lightning® Calendar [http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/projects/calendar/] as well as Atlassian® [http://www.atlassian.com].
